original_text: Then a teacher of God's Law spoke out. ‘Teacher,’ he said, ‘when you say these things, you are also saying bad things about us.’
korean_text: 한 율법교사가 예수께 대답하여 이르되 선생님 이렇게 말씀하시니 우리까지 모욕하심이니이다

sentences.original_text: Then a teacher of God's Law spoke out.
you are also saying bad things about us.'
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 우리에 대해 나쁜 말도 하고 있습니다.'
